metadata.title: CVE-2022-4182 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Fenced Frames in Google Chrome prior to108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker to bypass fenced frame restrictionsvia a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
